attributes.action: Uniform Code at John Cabot Acadamy School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are students at John Cabot Academy, whom are fed up with the constant complaining from teachers to remove our nail varnish. We would like to be able to express our feelings. We should be able to wear nail varnish because it does not affect our safety in any way or form. Also it does not affect how we perform in lessons.
We hope you understand how we feel and as children we also have the right to express what we think.
We have always been told not to give up in what we strongly believe in and now we are putting this saying into good use.

rejection.details:
Dear Nicole

Thanks for your petition request. Unfortunately this isn't a matter for the Prime Minister or Government and we have therefore rejected the petition. 

However, we wish you all the best and thank you for visiting the site.

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
